import React from 'react' import './CategoryManagement.css'; function CategoryManagement() { const [categorys, setcategorys] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:8989/api/category/getallcategory`) .then(res => setcategorys(res.data) ) .catch(error => console.log(error)); },[]); return (

Category Management

{ categorys.map((categor)) }
# Category Status Action
1 Watercolor
) } export default CategoryManagement
